summary: SummaryHighlightsClean IngredientsCruelty FreeVeganSustainable PackagingGive BackLiving Proof's Full Thickening Blow-Dry Cream is a high tech, lightweight styling cream with heat protection that delivers 30% thicker-looking hair that lasts all-day.
details: DetailsBenefitsDelivers 30% thicker-looking hair*Creates fuller-looking, denser-feeling hair with style longevity that lasts all daySmooths hair and adds shineProvides lightweight conditioningLeaves hair more manageable and with more movementHeat protection up to 450°F/232°C*Versus untreatedKey IngredientsTime-Released Styling Technology: Proprietary, time-released technology formulated with Living Proof's patented Thickening Molecule and water-soluble resins to create long-lasting body, fullness, and hold - without the stickiness.Thickening Molecule: Patented Lp. technology that deposits microscopic thickening dots between individual strands so hair looks, feels, and moves like it’s fuller.Amaranth peptides: Plumps individual hair fibers for bouncy, fuller-looking hair.Hydrolyzed corn starch: Provides light oil absorption to aid in style longevity.Optimized resin blend: Adds lasting hold that enhances body.Mushroom extract blend: Provides heat protection to prevent thermal damage.Formulated WithoutSiliconesSulfates (SLS + SLES)ParabensPhthalatesFormaldehydeItem 2609976How To UseApply to clean, damp, detangled hair starting mid-lengths to ends. Comb through. Blow-dry with a round brush.Hair type: Fine, thin, and low-density hair types.IngredientsWater/Eau/Aqua, Polyalkylaminoester-1, Hydrolyzed Corn Starch, PVP, Polyacrylate-13, Sodium Citrate, Phospholipids, Pentylene Glycol, Propylene Glycol Dibenzoate, Fructose, Sodium Hyaluronate, Glycerin, Maltodextrin/VP Copolymer, Myristyl Alcohol, Polyporus Umbellatus (Mushroom) Extract, Amaranthus Caudatus Seed Extract, Polysorbate 20, Xanthan Gum, Polyisobutene, PPG-2 Myristyl Ether Propionate, Oleth-10, Fragrance/Parfum, Hydroxyacetophenone, Ethylhexylglycerin, Linalool, Citronellol, Limonene, CitralShipping & Coupon RestrictionsShipping Restrictions : This item cannot be shipped via air.This brand is excluded from most Ulta Beauty coupons.See brand eligibility details
how_to_use: Apply to clean, damp, detangled hair starting mid-lengths to ends. Comb through. Blow-dry with a round brush.Hair type: Fine, thin, and low-density hair types.

reviews.headline: Adds Fullness
reviews.comments: It's a good product if used lightly. Don't use a lot or it can get heavy. Definitely adds some oomph with a blow dryer but for me doesn't really last into the next day. But almost nothing does as my hair is baby fine. I use this when I'm going out and want my hair to look a little extra. For that it works.

reviews.headline: This stuff really works!
reviews.comments: Best hair thickner out there. I've been using it for last 5 yrs.

reviews.headline: Perfect for fine hair
reviews.comments: I have very fine hair and this doesn't weigh it down or make it sticky (a rare find for me). It gives weightless volume and keeps my hair soft. I have repurchased it probably 5 times and really love this product!

reviews.headline: Would not buy again
reviews.comments: This product was too heavy for my hair. After blow drying my hair was flat.

reviews.headline: My go to blow dry cream for voluminous hair!
reviews.comments: Love this thickening cream! I have very fine hair wavy hair and use this when I am blowing out my hair. Does not weigh my hair down and gives me the most beautiful volume.  A little goes a long way and I only apply this on my ends. Too much product will leave your hair feeling greasy.

reviews.headline: LOVE
reviews.comments: My hair is long, straight, and lifeless. I absolutely love this product. It gives my hair shine, body, and life. Even 24 hours later... It was still working beautifully. Highly recommend. Bring some life back to that limp boring hair.

reviews.headline: Feels too heavy, leaves my hair feeling too sticky
reviews.comments: I have fine colored asian hair with psoriasis. I think this product might feel too heavy for my hair no matter how little I use. I don't like how it feels sticky even after blowdrying and how my hair gets more tangled throughout the day whenever I use this. It does hold a good blowout curl, though.

reviews.headline: Love
reviews.comments: I was actually surprised at how full this made my hair. It also appeared thicker. I will definitely buy again.

reviews.headline: It didn't work out for my hair!!!
reviews.comments:
I tried out the product the other day and was very unhappy with the results!!!! It did nothing for me!! My hair didn't turn out the way I had hoped  it would. My hair felt dried out and looked like it was dried out. It wasn't beneficial at all. I will
just stick to my old product..

reviews.headline: .I would buy this product again.  This is my second bottle.
reviews.comments: The product is great.  This is my second bottle.  However, I wish it was not soo expensive.  Maybe occasionally it could be put on sale.

reviews.headline: Horrible
reviews.comments: Too thick and does not make volume the way the sales lady said

reviews.headline: girl don't waste your money pls (like actually)
reviews.comments: Ok so I have FINE STRAIGHT HAIR and I usually use the OUAI volume spray and it works sooo good but they were out so I tried this since I wanted to before. Used it once and it literally did nothing... like actually nothing. I returned it.

reviews.headline: Not for my hair
reviews.comments: I seem to be one of the only reviewers that actually paid for this product. I love Living Proof products so I was very hopeful that this would help with my very fine hair that I am losing due to partial alopecia. Using the smallest amounts, my hair felt sticky and when I was drying my hair it would get tangled and then break or fall out completely. For someone trying to save their hair, this unfortunately doesn't work for me. I'm hoping I can return it.

reviews.headline: Surprisingly lives up to the hype
reviews.comments: This product really does give my hair volume, just like it says. I'm pleasantly surprised. I have a hard time finding products to give my straight, fine, limp hair body. And this product delivers.

reviews.headline: Small but smoothing
reviews.comments:
I've tried this cream a few times now in my 2-week trial and I found I could tell a difference in my hair when I used it. I typically let my hair air dry and it tends to be a bit frizzy, but when I use this cream my hair is noticeably smoother. 

It is a bit small given the price but then again I don't use a huge amount each time I use it. I guess I'll see when I finish if I'll repurchase. 

Gifted by Living Proof but all opinions are my own

reviews.headline: It's okay
reviews.comments: I have thin hair and unfortunately didn't see much difference. My hair did get really tangled. It didn't leave my hair greasy and the scent was not overpowering.  Complimentary from livingproof for my honest review.

reviews.headline: Good
reviews.comments: Living proof Full Thickening Blow-Dry Cream has transformed my hair routine. This lightweight cream adds incredible volume and thickness to my hair, giving it a fuller and bouncier look. It also provides heat protection and leaves my hair feeling soft and smooth. I love how it helps my blowout last longer while adding body and lift. A game-changer for achieving voluminous and beautiful hair. Gifted by livingproof

reviews.headline: Not for my hair type :(
reviews.comments: I tried to like this product but it didn't do much for my hair type. I have long, straight, fine hair that normally is flat because it's so hard to get volume. I tried using it twice and it left a weird texture on my hair and didn't really add any volume to my hair sadly. Gifted by living proof.

reviews.headline: Works, but a little too sticky for me
reviews.comments: This was gifted by livingproof to me and overall, the cream definitely added some body to my hair along with a little hold to keep it from falling flat, but I did find it a little too sticky where it was a little difficult to style blow dry my hair without it getting tangled. My hair is very straight and tangling is never an issue, but the only time I've struggled with it is when I use this.

reviews.headline: Love this stuff!
reviews.comments: I was gifted by Living Proof in exchange for my honest review. I have bought this product in the past and it works great for my  baby fine way/curly hair when I blow dry and style it straight. It is lightweight and gives my hair volume and reduces frizz.

media.headline: Not for thin fine hair types

faceoff_positive.comments: I've watched my mom go through bottles of the regular thickening cream for years, it's the one product she believes is worth the price so I was excited to give this new blow dry version a go! I love that there's a heat protectant in this product so that cuts down the need to use an additional product. I applied a small amount (I have very long hair and was surprised at how far the small amount I used went) to damp, towel dried hair. I used a blow dry brush to give myself a blow out, my hair looked so much more full when I was done. It kept its great body all day! The next day I curled my hair as I normally do and my curls had a nice bounce to them! My favorite thing about this product was it didn't weight my hair down at all. Now I get why my mom is so obsessed with this line! I received this product complimentary from living proof in exchange for my honest review.
faceoff_positive.headline: Great volume!

faceoff_negative.comments:
I received a complimentary from livingproof bottle of their Thickening Blow-Dry Cream and I have thin, fine, straight hair, so it can be difficult to find products that work well for me. The Thickening Blow-Dry Cream was not a good match for my hair type.

The product did not work well with my hair—it left it feeling weighed down. 
It wasn't appealing to me; it smelled terrible to me. This is something that might be more of a personal preference than a flaw in the product itself, but I wasn't a fan of it either way.

I would not recommend this product if you have thin, fine hair like mine because it will probably leave your hair feeling weighed down, and not at all volumized. If you have thicker or curlier hair types, then it might work better for you!
faceoff_negative.headline: Not for thin fine hair types
